snippet: Egypt swore in 10 new ministers, including those for finance and the interior, on Sunday in a cabinet shake-up aimed at improving the government’s handling of the economy.
abstract: Egypt swears in 10 new ministers, including those for finance and the interior, in cabinet shake-up aimed at improving government’s handling of the economy.
lead_paragraph: Egypt swore in 10 new ministers, including those for finance and the interior, on Sunday in a cabinet shake-up aimed at improving the government’s handling of the economy.
